```{r}
USvideos_NNA %>%
  mutate(category_id=as.character(category_id)) %>%
  group_by(category_id) %>%
  summarise(num=n()) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_col(aes(x=reorder(category_id,-num), y=num))
```
